caption.p: Kaplanâ€“Meier curves reporting the proportion of survivor (blue line) and fatal (red line) patients developing anti-EBOV specific IgM ( left) and IgG ( right) in relation days from symptom onset (DSO). The proportion of patients is expressed as a percentage. Statistical significance ( p < 0.05) by Log-rank test: IgM, p = 0.0351; IgG, p = 0.0141.
